!Priest Kanis: To enter the *Water Dragon's Cave*, you will need 1 Contaminated Crystal. The Contaminated Crystal can be found at the *Dark Cloud Mansion*. They say that a monster named *Baylor* rules over the *Water Dragon's Cave*. I believe that Baylor guards the place where the Shamaness is being held captive. If that is the case, you will only be able reach the Shamaness is being defeating Baylor. That creature is said to be far stronger and more frightening than ordinary monsters, so please be careful... [Quest _131_BirdInACage priest_kanis_q0131_15.htm|"I will depart now."]
